messages.title: Why Angie Bray has my vote
messages.content: Exclusive: Man who ran the Daily Mirror reveals why he's switching support from Labour to Angie Bray and David Cameron.

issues.economy: Brown's economic legacy is described as a disaster, with critiques of wasted money and tax increases.
issues.governance: Gordon Brown's tenure as Prime Minister is criticized for not tackling dysfunctional bureaucracies and for imposing stealth taxes.
issues.socialWelfare: Criticism of Gordon Brown's welfare state reforms and mention of financial irresponsibility.

endorsements.endorsement: Former editor of the Daily Mirror explains why he's supporting Angie Bray and criticizes Labour Party's past leadership.

quotes.text: Blair wasted his years of power. The money flowed in, but instead of financing a better way of life for ordinary people I was most of it just seeped away into the swamp of stupefying incompetence bred by New Labour.
quotes.source: Mike Molloy, Former editor of the Daily Mirror

images.caption: Mike Molloy endorses Angie Bray for his vote.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Mike Molloy, former editor of the Daily Mirror, provides his personal reasons for switching support to Angie Bray and discusses the failings of the Labour Party under Gordon Brown's leadership.
